title: Update HTML title and meta tags to jaysports.in

requirements.summary: Update frontend/index.html to reference jaysports.in in title, meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, and canonical URL
acceptanceCriteria: The <title> element in frontend/index.html displays 'jaysports.in' or 'Jay Sports | jaysports.in'
Open Graph og:url and og:site_name reference jaysports.in
Twitter Card meta tags reference jaysports.in
No references to old placeholder or staging domains remain in index.html

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag to read 'Jay Sports | jaysports.in'. Update the canonical <link> href to reference 'https://jaysports.in'. Update all Open Graph meta tags (og:url, og:site_name) to reference 'jaysports.in' without the 'www.' prefix. Update all Twitter Card meta tags to reference 'jaysports.in'. Remove any references to 'www.jaysports.in' or other placeholder domains, ensuring all metadata consistently uses the bare domain 'jaysports.in'.
